title: Wall St Week Ahead: Spotlight on Nvidia results

title: Should you worry about an AI bubble? Investment pros weigh in.
description: The stock market has stumbled on concerns that the surge in artificial intelligence stocks could echo the dot-com bubble.
content:
Artificial intelligence has fired the stock market to record highs this year, with companies eager to tout their AI prowess and investor darlings like AI chipmaker Nvidia soaring on expectations of runaway growth.
But a tinge of fear is starting to s... [4401 chars]

title: Google to invest $40 billion in new data centers in Texas, Bloomberg News reports
description: Alphabet's Google plans to invest $40 billion in three new data centers in Texas, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, as the technology giant accelerates efforts to expand capacity to support its artificial intelligence ambitions.
content:
One of the data centers will be in Armstrong County, in the Texas panhandle, and the other two in Haskell County, a stretch of West Texas near Abilene, the report said.
Sign up here.
Google did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment... [365 chars]

title: Aldol Robot Falls on Stage During Moscow Debut, Highlighting Russia’s Struggles with humanoid robot
description: Russia’s first domestically produced artificial intelligence-powered humanoid, named Aldol robot, took an unfortunate tumble during its public unveiling in Moscow this week. title: Google taps Texas for $40B AI investment to run through 2027
description: Google announced it will spend $40 billion in Texas on new cloud, artificial intelligence and energy infrastructure, energy programs and training.
content:
Google on Friday unveiled plans to invest $40 billion in Texas over the next couple of years, which will include the development of three new data centers across the state.

title: Anthropic warns of first reported AI-driven hacking campaign linked to China
description: The attack, aimed at around 30 global targets, was notable for the extent to which artificial intelligence was used to automate the work.
content:
A team of researchers has uncovered what they say is the first reported use of artificial intelligence to direct a hacking campaign in a largely automated fashion.

title: Morgan Freeman threatens legal action over AI use of his voice: 'You’re robbing me'
description: Morgan Freeman said his lawyers are already tackling unauthorized artificial intelligence (AI) uses of his voice that have left the actor displeased.
content:
Morgan Freeman said his lawyers are already “very, very busy” tackling unauthorized artificial intelligence (AI) uses of his voice that have left the actor feeling “a little PO’d.”

title: Japan's draft AI guidelines call for curbing deepfakes, building literacy
description: Japan's new guidelines for the appropriate use of artificial intelligence will urge companies to curb "deepfakes" and other misleading outputs, while encouraging users to build AI literacy, according to a draft outline. The guidelines, which would not be legally binding, also call on operators to ensure transparency by disclosing necessary…
